inclusion.criterion: Reproductive age and aspirations of future pregnancies
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Commitment to attend scheduled follow-up visits
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Colposcopy with transformation zone (ZT) type 1 or 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Colposcopy with grade 2 changes that are not extensive
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy at first visit or during follow-up
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppression (either iatrogenic or due to human immunodeficiency virus (HIV))
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion and HPV 16 positivity. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently.
